title: 96/507/EC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 24 July 1996 amending Decision 90/178/Euratom, EEC authorizing Luxembourg not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 July 1996 amending Decision 90/178/Euratom, EEC authorizing Luxembourg not to take into account certain categories of transactions and to use certain approximate estimates for the calculation of the VAT own resources base (Only the French text is authentic) (96/507/Euratom, EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Article 2 (2) of Decision 90/178/Euratom, EEC is hereby repealed in respect of transactions conducted with effect from 1 January 1995.
This Decision is addressed to the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1996.
For the Commission
Erkki LIIKANEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 155, 7. 6. 1989, p. 9.
(2) OJ No L 145, 13. 6. 1977, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 226, 3. 8. 1989, p. 21.
(4) OJ No L 99, 19. 4. 1990, p. 26.
